name: ccntTokenRecord
desc: Stores token information used by the AEResolve functionwhile locating a range of objects.

items.name: var token: AEDesc
items.desc: A token for the current container. (Token is definedin AEDisposeToken(_:). See AEDesc.

items.name: var tokenClass: DescType
items.desc: The class ID of the container represented by the token parameter.See DescType.
